department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Department of National Defence (DND), Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Breton (FMF CB), has a requirement for a Sheet Metal Shear Unit.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND), Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Breton (FMF CB), has a requirement for a Sheet Metal Shear Unit.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## W3555-233785 - Metal Plate Shear

### Solicitation Information

*   Tender Reference Number: WS3631896514
*   Publication Date: November 16, 2022
*   Tender Closing Date (13:00 ET): December 19, 2022
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

### Tender Details

*   *Ammunition Vehicles and Equipment Services, Department of National Defence*
*   Metal forming machinery and accessories, as per UNSPSC Code 23250000

### Tender Status

*   Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

### Tender Procedure

*   Tender Method: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Bid Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: Varying free trade agreements apply (see below)

### Regions

*   Delivery Regions: British Columbia

### Address

*   11 Laurier St, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5

### End User Information

Contact Jackson, Brittney at brittney.jackson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for further information.

### Notice URL

*   [discovery ariba link](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14644266?extsite=MTQ2NDQyNjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
